Texto: 
non-contributory
resection of nodule
cystic lesion in cerebellar vermis with enhancing nodule.
cerebellar hemangioblastoma
• astrocytoma
• cryptococcus
• hemangioblastoma
• pilocytic astrocytoma
• metastatic disease
44 year old woman who complained of feeling very hot and not able to perspire.  she also noted problems with ambulating and holding a pen.
